//kickass_info: url to use for kickass torrents
//tpb_info: url to use for the pirate bay
//peerflix_info: what player you want peerflix to use
//peerflix_player_args_info: what arguments you want peerflix to use for the player
//peerflix_port_info: what port you want peerflix to use
//peerflix_command_info: what port you want peerflix to use
//subtitles_info: do you want to fetch subtitles ? (true/false)
//subtitle_lang_info2: To find the abbriviation for your language go to the site below
//subtitle_lang_info3: press ctrl + f enter your language and the abbriviation is the first row
//history_info: do you want to save the history ? (true/false)
//date_info: if you want to show when the torrent was added where available (true/false)
